title: Artist Talk: Hans Haacke
hero_caption: Hans Haacke. Gift Horse, 2014. © Hans Haacke / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York. Courtesy of the artist and Paula Cooper Gallery, New York.
description:
Learn more about Hans Haacke’s extraordinary installation of Gift Horse, 2014, as well as Haacke’s profound influence on contemporary art during this conversation between the artist, Ann Goldstein, Deputy Director and Chair and Curator of Modern and Contemporary Art, and Susanne Ghez, Adjunct Curator and Curator of the exhibition.

A public reception and preview of the exhibition on the Bluhm Family Terrace will follow the conversation.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
